text: Mohammad Umer (19 April 1960 - 2 October 2021), also known as Umer Shareef, was a Pakistani actor, comedian, director, producer, and television personality. He was known for hosting The Shareef Show Mubarak Ho. Shareef died of pneumonia caused by cancer on 2 October 2021 at a hospital in Nuremberg, Germany at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Infectious disease deaths in Germany Category:Pakistani movie actors Category:Actors from Karachi Category:Comedians
title: Umer Shareef
